name: Skyone Hotel
detail: The hotel is new and clean, with bath tub, separate shower, sofa in the quad room with nice deco. It is very close to night market and few breakfast eateries. We can access washing machines and dryers at 11th floor (free of charge). Very good price for Quad room, and definitely one of our best day in our 12-day Taiwan trip. I highly recommend this hotel.

name: inns hotel
detail: I stayed there total of 5 nights, I would recommend my friends to stay there when in Kaohsiung. Hotel looks new and trendy enough, although single room is small but everything needed was there(except a fridge i suppose but i didn't need it). A nice touch for the coffee machine at ground floor and there's a laundry room for travelers to wash our laundry(self-serve coin machine, there's dryer too). Buffet was nice enough but style doesn't change much. Something to work on would be the sound-proofing of the rooms could be better. I can basically hear every word outside the corridor and the sound of TV when I'm at the corridor. Staff was great and efficient and provided me help with all my requests. I suppose there;s different design in each level and rooms, suitable for family to stay too.

name: Hotel Midtown Richardson - Kaohsiung Bo Ai
detail: Very close to houyi mrt station. When you have arrived Kaohsiung train station, just take the mrt to houyi mrt station, it's only one station away. Very convenient. The location of this hotel is 100m away from houyi. We booked two nights in Kaohsiung. However, due to the sudden change of our itinerary, both of us decided to forfeit the second night. The staff was kind enough to help us upgrade to two double beds during our one night stay :)

name: Centre Hotel
detail: It was the first time for me to make a visit to Kaohsiung and I was little nervous by reading some reviews about this hotel beforehand as it said staff members wouldn't speak English and I couldn't speak Chinese at all. However, they were friendly and tried helping me whenever I asked them questions in English, although their English was not perfect but we could communicate. They also gave me some tips about places that would be worth a visit. Just a suggestion to users in terms of communication, you should also try understanding messages which staff members try conducting, not just expecting them to speak perfect English. They are nice if you are nice. As for the location, it is super convenient as located right in front of the Formosa Boulevard station (just one minute!?) and close to a long, busy night market which is totally nice. You can enjoy good street food in the market just 3 minutes away from the hotel on foot. Just the cleanliness and maintenance of facilities in a room could be better but I have no complaint about it according to the amount of money I paid. That was far better than I thought. If you are generally fine to stay at a hostel level, this hotel should satisfy your needs. Overall, I will book and use the hotel again if I have a chance to visit Kaohsiung again.

name: Single Inn - Kaohsiung Station
detail: This is my lst time to kaohsiung city. & also my lst time to stay in SINGLE INN . Like the room , I wad a room with a single bed. The room was very clean & the bed was good to sleep. Every night I sleep very well. Toilet was very clean too. The best it was the quiet in this hotel .MRT & TRAIN STATION are very near. Just 5 min walk. Food are all beside the hotel too. Night markets are many. Just a few walk only. When want to go look for side seeing, shopping centre. Night markets. All are very ez to find the way. When I'm new in this place stay. I also like the hot bath & this is my lst time to take a hot bath. After the whole day walk. Body r weak , one hot bath can let me fill body less pain & also can had a good sleep too. GS staff r very friendly. They help me to find when to go for good view n good food. N it was 24 hour, they r in lobby to sevse me. Thanks u very much for them .they help me a lot. Is no ez for me 53 yr0 lady to find the way out with lst time stay. Very things r good .I give 100% well done job to the staff. Do miss to stay in SINGLE INN. U will be very & joy your hoilday. The room r very cheap and value for money. Dun miss it. Let try to stay u will know how awesome it was. Wish u had a happy hoilday too. From Singapore Lai ching.

name: GREET INN
detail: Stayed at Greet Inn after exploring other highly rated hotels in Kaohsiung. Glad we booked with Greet Inn. It's a newer hotel and very well decorated and furnished. It's close to a 7-11 and Family Mart for drinks and snacks. It's about 20 mins walking to Liuhe Nightmarket and 10 mins to the nearest MRT station. For the price of the hotel and the amenities, this hotel will be on my list of must stays in Kaohsiung.

name: Flyinn Hostel
detail: I was travelling with my friend and stayed in twin room. Good location,the staff were kind and very helpful. Will definitely come back to this place next time I'm in Kaohsiung!

name: Single Inn - Linsen
detail: All of the Staff are so hospitable ,most especially the hotel receptionists. The room is nice and clean .There is free sauna room, hot bath area , very nice dining and lounge area.Definitely , I'll stay here again when I'll travel in Kaohsiung, Taiwan in the near future. It's worth the pay and I could not ask for more.I highly recommend it for solo travelers like me.Thank you! P.S... I love the people in Kaohsiung , Taiwan...

name: Han Hsien International Hotel
detail: ive stayed at this hotel more than 3 times. i guarantee that this hotel is the best cost/performance hotel in Kaohsiung. Luxury feeling hotel interior and exterior, fantastic welcoming by excellent staff and romantic spectacular view from the top floor located bar. this is the must stay hotel in Kaohsiung.

name: HOTEL YOSHI KAOHSIUNG
detail: One of the best deals I've ever encountered on my travels - comfortable single room with new fixtures, an enjoyable breakfast buffet on the ground floor, and even CNN and a couple of other English-language stations on cable TV, for much less than what you would expect to pay for all this. It's only a couple of minutes on foot from the nearest MRT station, which doesn't take too long to get to from either the airport or Zuoying High Speed Rail station. The only thing is that the internet was slow at times during the night.
